properties.name: jwt.access-token-expiration
properties.description: Access token expiration in milliseconds Default: 15 minutes (900000ms)

properties.name: jwt.private-key
properties.description: RSA Private Key (Base64 encoded) Used ONLY by auth-service to SIGN tokens MUST be kept secret!

properties.name: jwt.public-key
properties.description: RSA Public Key (Base64 encoded) Used by ALL services to VERIFY tokens Safe to share across services

properties.name: jwt.refresh-token-expiration
properties.description: Refresh token expiration in milliseconds Default: 7 days (604800000ms)

properties.name: jwt.service-token-expiration
properties.description: Service-to-service token expiration in milliseconds Default: 5 minutes (300000ms)

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: @deprecated Use RSA keys instead (publicKey/privateKey) HMAC shared secret - NOT recommended for production
